title: Hardwood-style Flooring, Fitness Studio, Leash-Free Dog Park
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME', 'Creekside Vista values your safety!', 'The community has implemented social distancing practices due to COVID-19.', 'Meet us virtually or by appointment for a socially distanced outside meeting!', 'Masks are required!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 60', 'OR Text', '60', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1349 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Modern Styles', '- New Kitchen Appliance Package', '- Private Balconies', '- Hardwood-style Flooring', 'Community Amenities', '- Play Park', '- New Online Services', '- Fitness Studio', '- New Pool Lounge Area (Coming Soon)', '- Leash-Free Dog Park', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Cyber Cafe', '- Sundeck', '- Convenient Online Payments', '- Newly Renovated Homes', '- Resort-Style Swimming Pool', '- Clothes Care Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Pet Fee: $300', 'Pet Monthly Rent Min/Max: $20 - $40', 'Other Pets Allowed: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $20 per month, per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our leasing office for our pet policy.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Creekside Vista', '3100 Lumby Drive, Decatur, GA, 30034', 's2dt7RAq9mx']
